body.query: FROM test | sort emp_no | eval x1 = concat(ip1, ip2), x2 = coalesce(x1, "255.255.255.255"), x3 = to_ip(x2) | keep emp_no, x*

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.19.7-167ce63ff1236a16cf71304f35cc3bc2c0c9f9db "No limit defined, adding default limit of [1000]", 299 Elasticsearch-8.19.7-167ce63ff1236a16cf71304f35cc3bc2c0c9f9db "Line 1:98: evaluation of [to_ip(x2)] failed, treating result as null. Only first 20 failures recorded.", 299 Elasticsearch-8.19.7-167ce63ff1236a16cf71304f35cc3bc2c0c9f9db "Line 1:98: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: '127.00.1' is not an IP string literal."
